backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no exposed methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a footer link change in SiteFooter.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list summarizing all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry including SEO meta tags, favicon, and root mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all pages under SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution linking to webzio.caffeine.app.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including TopNav, main content, and SiteFooter.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with Webzio logo, desktop menu, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and refreshes backend actors based on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Hook that updates document title and meta description for SEO.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind global styles with color tokens, dark mode variants, and typography tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/instantPriceCalculatorP: Pricing matrix and helper functions for estimating service costs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that initializes React Query, Internet Identity, and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata and a short description of Webzioâ€™s mission.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Displays contact details, WhatsApp link, online-service note, and terms and conditions with SEO setup.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Shows the homepage hero, highlights, and intro text with navigation and SEO configuration.
frontend/src/pages/InstantPriceCalculato: Provides an instant price calculator using dropdowns for service type and work level, with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Lists available services, pricing notes, and a simple three-step process, including SEO setup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file storing project state, features, and metadata for the site attribution link update.
